entry.title: Dév. Front-End Web & Mobile
entry.summary:
We develop B2B services on real-time data for commodity traders.
We aggregate data from hundreds of sources, ranging from satellite data to governmental and shipping databases, and run algorithms on top of it to predict the flows of energy. Dataviz with maps and charts make the information actionable.
Position
As a Front-End Developer, you will contribute to the evolution of the web and mobile front part of our application including code, test, deployment and support, to visualize global located data (map and dashboard).
For instance, you will add new information on our map stemmed from ElasticSearch (markers, polyline via Google Map API) or improve our filters on the interface.
You will be tested and required to work on the following stack :
Languages :HTML5, CSS3, Javascript Framework : AngularJS, Ionic, Cordova Data : ElasticSearch, PostgreSQL Librairies : Google Map, d3, Google Visualization, RestAngular, Angular-UI Outils : GIT, Bower, Gulp, Heroku
The technical team works in lean mode to continually improve our SaaS applications and API. Our technologies are designed around: Scraper Python>Postgresql>ElasticSearch>Play2 Scala>AngularJS hosted on Heroku & AWS.
entry.content:
Requirements


IT or Engineer student in last year of studies and you are looking for a minimum  six month internship


Crafty, handy and pragmatic, you code on Linux / Mac and are both comfortable with CLI and graphical interfaces.

Ideally, you have a first experience in a SPA or large-scale mobile hybrid application.


You commit on Open Source projects and you are present on GitHub.


Functional english : To be able to interact with our 9 different nationalities



Other


  • Location : Paris, Beaubourg - 4ème arrondissement

  • Start date : Asap

  • Salary : According to profile and experience

  • Nature of contract: CDI / Full-time



If you are interested in the position, send your resume and a short cover letter to jobs@kpler.com
